title: Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney Lyrics Ninaivil Nindraval Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers : Bombay Jayshree, Sricharan
Song: Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney
Music Director : D Imman
Lyrics : Valee
Movie Name : Ninaivil Nindraval

Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney,Yen Kalvaney, Ennai cherava
Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney, Yen Kalvaney, Ennai cherava

Kulir vaadayai pola ennai thottu sendraai
Nejai aasayin yeniyil vittu sendraan
POllaatha kalvanthaane
ennai naane thirudukinren
[Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney, Ennai cherava] (2)

Maalai melirundhu medhuvaai irangi
Nilammel nadakkum nizhal megame
Manadhukule mazhai adithaal
Athan kaaranam kaaranam yaarthaano

Ulnaadi engum urchaaga melam
Pongaamal pongi paaindhoda
Mel moochu konjam, kel moochu konjam
Vaangaamal vaangi naan vaada
Inbamo thunbamo, sol thonraamal vazhkiren

Oruvan oruvan vizhiyin vazhiye
enaakul uthithaan etharkaagavo
Mana vayalil ninaivu vidhai 
Avan thoovida thoovida paarthaene

Munnalum illai, pinnalum illai 
ennalum illaa aanandham
Manmeedhu vazhum pen vazhvil illai 
en vazhvil thaane aarambam
Dhevathai yaavume kadhal seikindra leelayo...
Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney, Yen Kalvaney, Ennai cherava

Kulir vaadayai pol ennai thottu sendraai
Nejai aasayin yeniyil vittu sendraan
Pollaatha kalvanthaane
ennai naane thirudukinren  ..

Everything i wanna see your face
There are things i can relate
I am telling you be my maid
I'll show you your best days

seo.description: Get the complete Kalvaney Yen Kalvaney Lyrics Ninaivil Nindraval Song Lyrics from Ninaivil Nindraval. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by D Imman and sung by Bombay Jayashree. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vaali, Ninaivil Nindraval, D Imman, Bombay Jayashree, Sricharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
